about_the_game:
◆Game Introduction:
"Sexorcism" is a casual role-playing game with exorcism as the main theme.
A mysterious girl, with her powerful magic, resists demons. Facing endless enemies, her magical power gradually depletes. At this critical moment, you appear. As the male protagonist, you possess a rare ability. With your unique power of "semen that can restore magical power," you strive to rescue her from the plight of exhausted magic power, reversing fate.

◆Gameplay:
The classic game Fruit Plate combines magic and demon fighting to create a unique gameplay mode. Sexorcism combines elements of Fruit Plate, making every move you make full of randomness and excitement. You have to decide how to allocate the magical power you put into the spells on the game board, and as the reels spin, the spell that will be cast will ultimately be determined, and the damage multiplier will be determined based on the magical power you put in. After each victorious battle, you will have the chance to randomly gain stronger skills or brand new abilities, making every playthrough full of surprises and freshness.

◆Game Features
◇Gratifying battle feedback

◇Vivid Live2D and cinematography.

◇Interact as you wish

◇The adventure will continue after a short break


◇New gameplay created by combining Fruit Slot, Magic and Demon Slaying

◇Gain enhancements or new abilities upon victory in battle and explore more novel experiences

◇To replenish the magic, you must demonstrate your 'abilities' everywhere.

◇All main characters are fully voice acted

◇Provide an emergency way for players to unlock all CGs

content_descriptors.notes:
．All characters portrayed in this game are over the age of 20.
．This game contains a lot of sexual content
